茠茠茠
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 休, 薅
Связанный персонаж (и): Xiu, 薅

茠字的基本解释

茠
hāo
古同“薅”，除（草）。

茠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiū］
［《集韻》虚尤切，平尤，曉。］
在树荫下休息。
[②]［hāo］
［《廣韻》呼毛切，平豪，曉。］
同“薅1”。

茠字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　茠； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1027第39
【唐韻】同薅。【說文】薅，或从茠。【詩·周頌】以薅荼蓼。【疏】薅，或作茠。【漢制攷】疁田茠草。【唐書·陸龜蒙傳】身操畚?，茠刺無休時。【註】茠刺，除草也。　又【集韻】虛尤切。與庥通。【玉篇】䕃也。【淮南子·精神訓】得茠越下，則脫然喜矣。　又山名。【水經注】〈山兆〉浦逕縣下西流至於浦陽茠山。　又【集韻】許?切。與豆蔲之蔲同。

茠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
茠字的起名意思

暂无。

Pomegranate
Basic explanation of words
Pomegranate
hāo
In ancient times, "weed" and weeded (grass).
Pomegranate
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiū］
["Ji Yun" Xu Youqie, Pingyou, Xiao. ]
Rest in the shade.
[②]［hāo］
["Guangyun" Hu Maoqie, Pinghao, Xiao. ]
Same as "薅1".
Pomegranate
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　茠; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1027 Page 39
【Tang Yun】Same as 薅. 【Said the text】薅, or from 茠. 【Poetry·Song of Zhou】It's a lotus flower. 【Sparse】薅, or as 茠. 【Han-style test】Citrus vulgaris. [Tang Shu·Lu Guimeng Biography] Physical exercises, thorns are endless. [Note] Pork thorns, weeding also.　[Jiyun] Xu Youqie. With Xutong. [Jade articles] Dying also. [Huainanzi·Spiritual Training] The more you get down, the more happy you are.　Also the name of the mountain. [Water Classic Note]Pujing County flows westward to Puyang Poshan.　[Ji Yun] Xu? Cut. Same as Doupin.
